query: SELECT id, title, description, category, thumbnailUrl, fileUrl, downloadCount FROM leadMagnets ORDER BY sortOrder, id

rows.title: Compliance Quick Wins Checklist
rows.description: 5 immediate actions to reduce violations by 20% in 30 days. Proven strategies from facilities that passed their surveys with zero deficiencies.

rows.title: Staffing Quick Wins Checklist
rows.description: 3 proven tactics to reduce overtime costs by 15% this month. Implemented by facilities that cut overtime budgets by $48K annually.

rows.title: Financial Quick Wins Checklist
rows.description: Find $10K+ in hidden savings in 30 days. Cost-cutting strategies that don't compromise care quality.

rows.title: Medication Safety Quick Wins Checklist
rows.description: Eliminate common medication errors in 30 days. Safety protocols that reduce liability and improve resident outcomes.

rows.title: Person-Centered Care Quick Wins Checklist
rows.description: Boost family satisfaction scores by 20% in 30 days. Strategies that create meaningful resident engagement and quality of life.

rows.title: Stop Chasing Reimbursement: The Cost-Cutting Revolution in Residential Care
rows.description: Why revenue maximization is a losing strategy. This contrarian financial guide shows how radical cost reduction through technology delivers 20-30% margins—without touching reimbursement rates.

rows.title: Medication Management 2.0: Why Your Current System is Dangerous
rows.description: Up to 27% of residents experience medication errors. Discover why manual processes virtually guarantee mistakes—and how AI-powered systems achieve 99.9% accuracy while reducing administration time by 50%.

rows.title: The Active Treatment Trap: Rethinking Person-Centered Care in ICF-ID
rows.description: More programming doesn't equal better outcomes. Learn the data-driven approach to person-centered care that reduces structured hours by 45% while increasing goal achievement by 107%.

rows.title: The ICF-ID Compliance Paradox: Why Perfect Documentation Still Gets You Cited
rows.description: Discover the contrarian approach to regulatory compliance that reduces survey prep time by 85% while achieving zero deficiencies. Based on analysis of 2,847 survey reports.
